title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Among the noblemen of distinction, there appeared in person, or by representation, the Marquis of Huntly, eldest son of the Duke of Gordon ;the Marquis of Tulliebardine, eldest son of theDuke of Athole; the Earls of Nithsdale, Marischal,Traquair, Errol, Southesk, Carnwath, Seaforth,and Linlithgow; the Viscounts of KUsythe, Kenmuir, Kingston, and Stormount; the Lords RoUo,Duffus, Drummond, Strathallan,OgUvy,andNairne.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Among the noblemen of distinction, there ap-peared in person, or by representation, the Mar-quis of Huntly, eldest son of the Duke of Gordon ;the Marquis of Tulliebardine, eldest son of theDuke of Athole ; the Earls of Nithsdale, Marischal,Traquair, Errol, Sonthesk, Carnwath, Seaforth,and Linlithgow; the Viscounts of Kilsythe, Kenmuir, Kingston, and Stonnount; the Lords Hollo,Duffus,Druniiiiond,Strathallan,Ogilvy,and Nairne.
